long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension now includes a user activity bar that shows the percentage of weekends the user has been involved in Amtgard for the last six months. This data is culled from the ORK, so the user must have a known ORK entry for this bar to appear.

Users with very low activity levels or no activity will have red bars, low activity levels will have orange, semi-activite users will have yellow bars, and active users will have green bars, with the bar size increasing as their percentage of activity increases.

Next to the activity bar are ratings for users. Ratings are for martial skill (grey), artistic ability and vision (green), intelligence and wisdom (purple), and friendliness and approachability (blue). 

This extension includes a hovercard that shows additional information about the user when the ratings chart is hovered over.

The ratings are curated. Users can provide updated data for other users, which will be reviewed by the curators.
